concept.title: Generating a PIN validation value from an encrypted PIN block

titlealts.navtitle: Generating a PIN validation value from an encrypted PIN block
titlealts.searchtitle: (): Generating a PIN validation value from an encrypted PIN block

concept.shortdesc: To generate a clear VISA PIN validation value (PVV) from an encrypted PIN block, call the verb.

keywords.indexterm: personal identification number (PIN)generatingfrom encrypted PIN block

conbody.p: The PIN block can be encrypted under an input PIN-encrypting key (IPINENC) or an output PIN encrypting key (OPINENC).
